Sentencas: Biogas, landfill gas, associated petroleum gas, and other tail gases accompanying various industrial processes are potential sources of hydrogen and carbon monoxide for solid oxide fuel cells via the reforming process.
Titulo: A fast Gaussian process-based method to evaluate carbon deposition during hydrocarbons reforming

Sentencas: As these gases contain heavy hydrocarbons, fine-tuning of steam and carbon dioxide addition and specific temperature control are necessary to avoid carbon deposition during the reforming process.
Titulo: A fast Gaussian process-based method to evaluate carbon deposition during hydrocarbons reforming

Sentencas: Numerical simulation plays a crucial role in designing miniaturized steam reforming reactors and optimal working conditions.
Titulo: A fast Gaussian process-based method to evaluate carbon deposition during hydrocarbons reforming

Sentencas: All sim-ulations of reforming processes must account for carbon deposition.
Titulo: A fast Gaussian process-based method to evaluate carbon deposition during hydrocarbons reforming

Sentencas: The methods commonly seen in the open literature include Gibbs free energy minimization or parametric equations formalism.
Titulo: A fast Gaussian process-based method to evaluate carbon deposition during hydrocarbons reforming

Sentencas: This paper utilizes Gaussian process regression as a tool for making predictions about which reforming parameters are suitable for carrying out this process without the danger of damaging the catalyst due to a carbon formation.
Titulo: A fast Gaussian process-based method to evaluate carbon deposition during hydrocarbons reforming

Sentencas: Parametric equations formalism and Gibbs free energy minimization involve either the minimization of objective function or a search for roots of nonlinear functions.
Titulo: A fast Gaussian process-based method to evaluate carbon deposition during hydrocarbons reforming

Sentencas: These tasks are sensitive to a choice of the starting points of the algorithm d wrong choice of starting points could lead to numerical instability.
Titulo: A fast Gaussian process-based method to evaluate carbon deposition during hydrocarbons reforming

Sentencas: Unlike conventional methods, the Gaussian process regression approach by-passes the computation of equilibrium composition.
Titulo: A fast Gaussian process-based method to evaluate carbon deposition during hydrocarbons reforming

Sentencas: It predicts carbon formation tendencies directly from the initial conditions which ensure stability.(c) 2021
